channel.title: Telnet on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Telnet on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Telnet Pentesting
item.description: Enumeration link nmap --script telnet-encryption -p 23 <target-ip> nmap --script telnet-ntlm-info -p 23 <target-ip> nmap --script telnet-brute --script-args userdb=users.txt,passdb=passwords.txt,telnet-brute.timeout=8s -p 23 <target-ip> Configuration Files link cat /etc/inetd.conf # or cat /etc/xinetd.d/telnet Connect link telnet <target-ip> <target-port> telnet <target-ip> 23
